page.title: 19LOCAL NEWS AND EVENTS.
page.content: On{February 19th 1985}the Spread Eagle Pub burnt down. The blaze started in the morning and seven fire engines came. The remains of the pub were pulled down two months later. It has not yet been rebuilt. In{April 1985}Mr.John Davies retired after thirty years as village milkman. Some of his customers collected money and gave him a cheque for Â£180. In{November 1984}work started to alter the church.The chancel was unsafe and had to be knocked down.Church services are being held in the school. On{Sunday 26th May 1985}there was a hailstorm.The hailstones were as big as golf balls and did a great deal of damage to crops and property.
